author: tbrandenburg
body:
@task 

Analyze a niche B2B market of your choice and generate a complete micro-business plan, including:
	•	A unique value proposition backed by market gaps
	•	A minimal viable product outline
	•	A 30-day execution roadmap
	•	A financial projection model
	•	A competitor differentiation matrix
Assign agents for research, synthesis, financial modeling, and strategy.
title: B2B
